description:
API connector to the Balena.io platform.  

"Balena is a complete set of tools for building, deploying, and managing fleets of connected Linux devices."

More info on the Balena platform can be found here? 
https://www.balena.io/what-is-balena 

API Overview: https://www.balena.io/docs/reference/api/overview/

Application API: https://www.balena.io/docs/reference/api/resources/application/
name: Balena Application API
plugin_instructions:
Setup:

1. Generate Balena Cloud API key. Log into your Balena cloud account at https://balena.io. Navigate to your account --> Preferences --> Access Tokens --> Create API Key
2. Enter API key in the plugin setup page as shown below:

Bearer {YOUR_API_TOKEN}

Usage:

The demo Bubble App should be helpful to get you going. If you need more help configuring or running, feel free to reach out our check/contribute here: 

https://github.com/ArbitraryY/bubbalena-application-api/wiki
